meanings.definition: A person who works jointly on an activity or project.
meanings.sent1: The collaborators shared ideas to finish the project.
meanings.sent2: The team of collaborators completed the task together.
meanings.sent3: The collaborators joked while brainstorming for the presentation.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork made them the best collaborators in the company.
meanings.sent5: The collaborators' dedication led to a successful outcome.

meanings.definition: A group of people who work together on a common goal.
meanings.sent1: The collaborators gathered to discuss the project's progress.
meanings.sent2: The collaborators celebrated their achievement as a team.
meanings.sent3: The collaborators enjoyed a pizza party after reaching their goal.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the collaborators was as strong as family.
meanings.sent5: The collaborators' unity was key to their success.
